#text=Every other month , I get a haircut from my favorite barbershop in the heart of the city .
#text=I love the barbershop because the haircuts are cheap and the barbers are always making jokes about ANYTHING .
#text=Last week , I went to the barbershop to get my hair cut with my friend , John .
#text=John and I took my car and arrived there around noon so that my favorite barber would be there .
#text=Luckily , my barber and another good barber were there and ready for us .
#text=We took our seats and they draped the long black cloth over our bodies so the hair would n't get all over us .
#text=Then , they combed our hair so that it made it easier to cut it .
#text=Next , they turned on their clippers and began cutting our hair .
#text=As they cut , they talked about all the big topics and new of the day .
#text=There were plenty of laughs just like I expected !
#text=After they were done , they sprayed our hair with sheen , brushed us off , took off the cloth , and showed us the finished product in the mirrors .
#text=We paid them for the haircuts , with a nice little tip added on , and left the shop .
